transcript_chunks.text: 1 to 10 kind of funny scale of Borderlands uh you know watching the trailer for this movie going into it I was not expecting much and unfortunately it actually didn't even live up to those expectations this movie is barely a movie it barely inks by with a plot that's somewhat coherent and it has the cardinal sin of any pop kind of big budget action movie in that it is just boring so I would give this a three out of 10
